subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Jones scores 16 points as the No. 6 Mountaineers, with their highest Associated Press ranking since February 1982, win in their first game after a 10-day break.
snippet: Kevin Jones scores 16 points as the No. 6 Mountaineers, with their highest Associated Press ranking since February 1982, win in their first game after a 10-day break.
